name: Map Disk to LXC Container
description:
Mounts a block device (by UUID) from the Proxmox host into an LXC container as a bind mount, with UID/GID mapping.

This template can be called independently of the LXC container's state (running or stopped) and is safe to call multiple times (idempotent), e.g. before using the share.

parameters.name: ID of the LXC Container
parameters.description: ID of the LXC container to which the disk will be mapped.

parameters.name: Storage Selection
parameters.description: Select storage to mount. Filesystems are prefixed with 'uuid:', ZFS pools with 'zfs:'.

parameters.name: Mount point host & container
parameters.description: Mount point on the Proxmox host and inside the container.

parameters.name: UID for mount directory
parameters.description: Optional: UID to set for the mount directory and bind mount. If not provided, default permissions will be used.

parameters.name: GID for mount directory
parameters.description: Optional: GID to set for the mount directory and bind mount. If not provided, default permissions will be used.

commands.description: Executes the script to map the disk by UUID and set up the bind mount in the container.
